Installing SBT

  1. wget http://dl.bintray.com/sbt/rpm/sbt-0.13.5.rpm
  2. rpm2cpio sbt-0.13.5.rpm | cpio -idv
  3. mkdir sbt-tool
    1. mv etc sbt-tool/
    2. mv usr sbt-tool/
  4. module load java
  5. sbt-tool/usr/bin/sbt --version
  6. append path of sbt-tool/usr/bin to your PATH variable

Building fgbio

  1. git clone https://github.com/fulcrumgenomics/fgbio.git
  2. cd fgbio
  3. sbt assembly
  4. Usage: (a) java -jar /isilon/Analysis/research/workspace/sri/dedupComparision/fgbio/target/scala-2.11/fgbio-0.1.4-SNAPSHOT.jar <command>
